title: Ep. 678 What Did Obama Know? When Did He Know It?
description:
Summary:
Did Obama lay the groundwork in 2012 for the 2016 spying attack on the Trump team? The evidence is compelling and troubling. I also address another explosive connection between the Clinton Foundation and the spying scandal. Finally, I discuss the liberal love affair with inflation and negative interest rates and why this matters to you. 
 

News Picks:
This incredible piece discusses a possible mechanism by which the Obama administration covered its tracks in the spying scandal. 
 
Did Obama’s 2012 dirty tricks lay the groundwork for their 2016 spying attack on Trump? 
 
More on Obama’s 2012 dirty tricks. 
 
The Trump tax cuts are now in effect and the numbers are in. Here’s what happened to tax revenue, and it’ll drive liberals mad. 
 
The Clinton Foundation is in a world of trouble.
 
Is this what the Clintons are hiding?
 
Obama’s administration removed 500k names from the background check system for a bizarre reason. 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
